thread.title: These Stunning Images Show Kashmir Is A Magical Winter Wonderland Right Now
thread.title_full: These Stunning Images Show Kashmir Is A Magical Winter Wonderland Right Now

author: Indrani Basu
title: These Stunning Images Show Kashmir Is A Magical Winter Wonderland Right Now
text:
These Stunning Images Show Kashmir Is A Magical Winter Wonderland Right Now Amazing. Indrani Basu News Editor, HuffPost India NEW! HIGHLIGHT AND SHARE   Getty Images Shikara boats are moored the bank of Dal lake next to the snow clad mountains in Dal Lake on February 06, 2017 in Srinagar, the summer capital of Indian Administered Kashmir, India. Cold weather continued in the Kashmir valley with most places in the state recording sub-zero temperatures.(Photo by Yawar Nazir/Getty Images) ADVERTISEMENT 
Kashmir has always been beautiful but the heavy snowfall in the past month has transformed it into a dreamy winter wonderland. The valley, which recorded the heaviest snowfall in 25 years this January, is expected to receive more snow in the next few days. 
Locals and tourists both have taken full advantage of the snow, and are making beautiful ice sculptures and playing snow games. 
The locals call this harsh cold weather "chillai kalan", reported The Times of India , as it is reportedly indicative of a good rabi crop in the summer. 
Here are some stunning images from Kashmir this year. LightRocket via Getty Images A boatman ships people on a sunny day in Dal Lake after witnessing heavy snowfall from the past few days the weather is likely to improve in upcoming days says Meteorological department Kashmir. (Photo by Faisal Khan/Pacific Press/LightRocket via Getty Images) SUBSCRIBE AND FOLLOW
